SELECT
MEM.MEMBER_SEQ /*담당자시퀀스*/ , MEM.MEMBER_ID /*담당자ID*/ , MEM.PASSWORD /*비밀번호*/ , MEM.MEMBER_NAME /*담당자이름*/ , MEM.EMAIL /*이메일*/ , fn_cellphone(MEM.EXTENSION_NO) AS EXTENSION_NO /*회사전화번호*/ , fn_cellphone(MEM.MOBILE_NO) AS MOBILE_NO /*휴대폰번호*/ , TO_DATE(MEM.JOIN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS JOIN_DT /*가입일*/ , MEM.CRE_YN /*협회여부*/ , MEM.CRE_GRP /*협회그룹*/ , FN_CD_DTL('CRE001', MEM.CRE_GRP) AS CRE_GRP_NM /*협회그룹명*/ FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS MEM WHERE MEM.COM_CODE = 1 AND MEM.DROP_YN = 'N'
